package.notes: Release Notes: 1. Restructuring of previous version code and implemented compatibility with Coinifiy API v3 2. Simplified Block responsible for checkout note. 3. Adjusted Payment Method Class, newly created orders will have status "Pending Payment" 5. Magento Invoices will be created only after IPN callback, if successfully payment has been done 6. Added two order statuses: Coinify Overpaid and Coinify Partially Paid 7. Added additional fields in System Configuration: Checkout Message, API Secret, IPN Secret, Debug (yes/no)
